attribs.name: proficiencies
attribs.current:
Armor: Light armor
Weapons: Simple weapons, hand crossbows, longswords, rapiers, shortswords
Tools: Thieves' tools

attribs.name: class_features_turned_on
attribs.current: EXPERTISE SNEAK_ATTACK THIEVES_CANT CUNNING_ACTION UNCANNY_DODGE EVASION RELIABLE_TALENT

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlLBv1FriCDEPHeMT_content
attribs.current:
Choose two of your skill proficiencies, or one of your skill proficiencies and your proficiency with thieves' tools. Your proficiency bonus is doubled for any ability check you make that uses either of the chosen proficiencies.
At 6th level, you can choose two more of your proficiencies (in skills or with thieves' tools) to gain this benefit.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlLBxHh4uTEQiIu-M_content
attribs.current:
You know how to strike subtly and exploit a foe's distraction. Once per turn, you can deal extra damage to one creature you hit with an attack if you have advantage on the attack roll. The attack must use a finesse or a ranged weapon.
You don't need advantage on the attack roll if another enemy of the target is within 5 feet of it, that enemy isn't incapacitated, and you don't have disadvantage on the attack roll.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlLByIo5SZb7xk791_content
attribs.current:
During your rogue training you learned thieves' cant, a secret mix of dialect, jargon, and code that allows you tohide messages in seemingly normal conversation. Only another creature that knows thieves' cant understands such messages. It takes four times longer to convey such a message than it does to speak the same idea plainly.
In addition, you understand a set of secret signs and symbols used to convey short, simple messages, such as whether an area is dangerous or the territory of a thieves' guild, whether loot is nearby, or whether the people in an area are easy marks or will provide a safe house for thieves onthe run.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlN3PvR557elzAXh5_content
attribs.current: Your quick thinking and agility allow you to move and act quickly. You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlN3gbCLy58HaR5dq_content
attribs.current: When an attacker that you can see hits you with an attack, you can use your reaction to halve the attack's damage against you

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KlzlN3zqOYRTQqiIFPr_content
attribs.current: Your instinctive agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain area effects, such as a blue dragon's lightning breath or a fireball spell. When you are subjected to an effect that allows you to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, you instead take no damage if you succeed on the saving throw, and only half damage if you fail.

attribs.name: personality_traits
attribs.current: i hide scraps and trinkets i like to also squeeze into small spaces

attribs.name: ideals
attribs.current: i help those who help me

attribs.name: bonds
attribs.current: no one should have to go through what i went through

attribs.name: flaws
attribs.current: id rather kill someone in their sleep than in a fight

attribs.name: appearance
attribs.current:
a tiny lizard with grey skin scuttles through the darkness searching for it next target. leathery wing protrude from his back allowing him to take flight from those who would harm him.
wearing a hood of mixed greys with his wings make him look like a small cloaked child slipping between the shadows

attribs.name: backstory
attribs.current:
skudd the tiny has always been the runt of the litter of urd and has had to fend for himself. pick pocketing and striking from the shadows has always come natural for the tiny.

In the warrens of baulders gate Skudd has made his home pilfering from the unwary. In his eight years in the realms he has seem much more than most of his kin who live in the wilds. with his skills he has earned his place in the thieves guild and lives in relative comfort these days. Skudd has fought to reach the top of his pile and refuses to take lip from anyone. he believes that he is a dragon midget.

attribs.name: miscellaneous_notes
attribs.current:
his trinket is a small mechanical spider that moves when not being observed.

his archetype is :Assassin
He has advantage on any creature that hasnt taken a turn in combat. any hit scored on a surprised creature is a critical hit
He also has the infiltration ability this allows him to create an identity. this takes him 7 days and costs 25 gp

owns a set of thieves tools and a poisoners kit as well as a pack to carry it all

attribs.name: repeating_classfeature_-KpNuluUd1qn2BXT2Zny_content
attribs.current: You have refined your chosen skills until they approach perfection. Whenever you make an ability check that lets you add your proficiency bonus, you can treat a d20 roll of 9 or lower as a 10.
